summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas for the period from February 1, 2014, to February 28, 2014. It details deposits, checks paid, service charges, and ending balances, indicating financial activity related to an account.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The document summarizes account balances for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
The account had a beginning balance of $388,279.30 and an ending balance of $394,793.42 as of February 28, 2014.
There were deposits totaling $57,102.12 and checks paid amounting to $588.00 during the statement period.
Service charges included NSF return item fees and overdraft fees.
The document includes contact information for customer service inquiries regarding account errors.
